definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

sentences.english: Then we'll do some wind sprints and try to take a few shots.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們就來做一些折返跑以及試着投幾球。

sentences.english: Some vessels turned back to be acute angles and some were observed as blind channels.
sentences.chinese: 毛細血管部分成銳角折返，亦可見毛細血管盲端。

sentences.english: The float-sink effect is the mechanical mechanism for the formation and'exhumation of UHP rocks.
sentences.chinese: “浮沉子效應”是超高壓岩石形成和折返的力學機制。

sentences.english: Qiu Wen give any way to see a doctor, found that just a little cold, they will return.
sentences.chinese: 邱雯給任路東看病，發現只是有點感冒，便折返。

sentences.english: They came to the turn in the race.
sentences.chinese: 他們來到了賽跑的折返點。

sentences.english: Ministry of Defense request that the plane turn back halfway, for use in disaster relief.
sentences.chinese: 防衛省要求下，這架飛機中途折返，以便用於救災。

sentences.english: It is known that the macro-reentry activation in the right atrium is the mechanism of atrial flutter.
sentences.chinese: 心房撲動的發生機制是右房內的大折返激動。

sentences.english: So your big plans fall through; are you going to go home and sulk?
sentences.chinese: 你的龐大計劃瓦解了，你應該折返回去還是鬧情緒？

sentences.english: Objective To report the experience of radiofrequency catheter ablation(RFCA) for atrioventricular reentrant tachycardia (AVRT).
sentences.chinese: 目的總結導管消融治療房室折返性心動過速的經驗。

sentences.english: Adjusting switch structure and altering turn-back mode.
sentences.chinese: 調整岔線結構和改變折返方式。

sentences.english: Low-Cost, Wide Input Range, Step-Down Controllers with Foldback Current Limit.
sentences.chinese: 低成本，寬輸入範圍，降壓型控制器折返電流限制。

sentences.english: However, ouyang following the turn-back scene, will advise DE shi return the case to the court to solve.
sentences.chinese: 然而，歐陽繼折返現場，勸德仕將案件交回法庭解決。

sentences.english: Station-front turning-back normally applied on stations with two lines intersected in T-shape.
sentences.chinese: 站前折返一般應用在兩條線路呈T型交叉的車站。

definition: to turn back/to retrace one's steps
variant of 掉頭|掉头[diao4 tou2]
to turn one's head/to turn round/to turn about
to go by a roundabout route/to take a detour/(medicine or civil engineering) bypass
to return/to go back/to come back
to make a detour/to take the long route
to reassign sb to a different job/to turn around/to change direction/to make a U turn
